TutorialScene.name: Ferdinand
dialog: Hello!
Huge Scary portal appeared in the woods... Scary now.
Please help!
Monsters stole people... Now village empty.
Ferdinand sad now...

TutorialScene.name: Johnson
dialog: STOP!
What are your doing here?
What? You are just a traveller?
Well... I am sorry. To be honest - We are currently having a big problem in our village.
Hmm... Thats a nice sword you have here. Are you a warrior?
I am begging you - Can you visit the smith down the road?
He will tell you what happend here.

TutorialScene.name: Solaire
dialog: Hello fella!
Are you here to help?
It was pure chaos the last few hours...
How did this even happen?
It was such a beautiful day - Even the sun was shining.
Your are searching the smith?
I think he is right next to the portal. Just walk further right.
... Just so you know... I am really glad that you are here.

TutorialScene.name: Alberich
dialog: Hello there!
Are you here to help? We are really in need of a helping hand.
You know... This huge portal just appeared a few hours ago.
I do not know what is happening or why it is happening.
The moment the portal materialised a horde of monsters came out und kidnapped most of our citizens.
Even the majors daughter was taken by a swarm of bats. I have never seen such creatures...
You want to help? Great!
It would be awesome if you can rescue the majors daughter from the fangs of the monsters!
The existence of this village is depending on you!

VillageScene.name: Ferdinand
dialog: Hmm...
Hmm?
Oh sorry. I not see you comin'.
You know... I love rocks!
I LOVE ROCKS!
If you have' talk to me. I give you reward. I found yellow stones in the woods.
Shiny rocks... But not for Ferdinand. He is me.

VillageScene.name: Alfred
dialog: Hey there!
Are you still killing those creatures?
I am happy that most of the monsters are slimes. Easy to kill you know... Well a bit slimy but still.
Imagine what would happen if other - much stronger - foes would spawn in.
Zombies would be hilarious. They would be so stupid that you could probably run in circles and they would not catch you.
I think the more important question is where the portal leads.
Only 4 different locations were discovered by now.
Imagine if you hop inside and fall out in the middle of a jungle.
This really reminds me of something...

SmithScene.name: Alberich
dialog: Hello there!
I am called Alberich and I am the smith in this village!
If you are looking for a sword or shield you are lucky!
My craftsmanship is well know in the whole country!
Once I even made 3 beautiful longswords for the king's 3 children!
It would be a shame if these swords were ever used in combat...
Hmm...
Oh excuse me! I got lost in my thougths!
So what do you want?

ShopScene.name: Grunilde
dialog: Oh hello again!
Thank you for saving me back there in the cave.
I was so afraid... I thought I would never see the sunlight again!
But then you came and saved me... My hero!
I am Grunilde and I run this shop
To be honest... This shop is also used as an tavern by most of the villagers.
So go ahead and sit down by the fire or buy something from me.
You have the choice.

ShopScene.name: Hartwin
dialog: Hello fella.
Thanks for saving me.
To be honest I am still in stock...
So do you mind leaving me alone?
